name: Fairfax - Caramel
description:
So young, yet so achingly stylish and full of confidence. Don't blame us if the other kids stare in envy as your stroller wheels by.
  • Soft, flexible yet durable SafeBend™ temple technology
  • Ergo-designed rubber bridge pads for developing noses
  • 100% UV protection lenses compliant with US, European, Australian and New Zealand standards
  • Handcrafted in Italy
  • Free shipping in U.S.
Measurements:
Age 1 - 3 Years
47-11-118
Age 3 - 5 Years
50-12-118
what's this?

Also available in:
